value:
Some call me the Archer General, but I
feel I can serve a kingdom better as
an administrator than a general.

I see myself clearly, I think. I don't
have my parents' battle acumen. So I
make myself useful in other ways.

I'm also glad to handle some tasks
for you at the castle. Your burden is
heavy. I'm glad to bear some of it.

I have a younger sister named Clarine.
She's nice, once you get to know her.$k$pClarine does live a bit too much in
her own world though. Still, she's
very sweet in her own way.

I learned all of the etiquette needed
at court in my own world. I hope
that some of it applies here.

Well, greetings. I've come to say
hello on behalf of your friend
$Nf.

What a surprise! This is
unusual for me.

It seems I'm growing at a
respectable pace.

Hmm. A reminder of my
shortcomings.

Thank you. I'll do my best to live
up to your expectations.

I am Klein, son of Count Reglay
of Etruria. I'll be happy to
accompany you!

Thanks to my noble birth, I've had
the fortune to meet many different
people during my life.$k$pI feel it's made me a good
judge of character.$k$pFor example, those who talk
the talk rarely walk the walk.
And they often run away.$k$pThen there are those who hardly
say a word and never boast,
yet are quick to help others.$k$pSuch a person saved me when I
was a child. That's how I know
that I can trust you fully.$k$pAnd I devote my skills to your
cause and will continue to do so.
It's an honor to serve you.
はっ！
ふっ！
うああっ！
Drat...
I won't miss.
Such foolishness.
At this range...
Now, my turn.
Fall here...?
Heh
Anything I can do for you? Please, name it.
What?! Oh, you. Caught me off guard.
I'm always worried about my younger sister. Can't help it!
Let us stay vigilant, for your sake and that of your family.
They call me the Archer General, for what that's worth.
Wouldn't going with the flow be bliss? But in time, what becomes of such a life?
Please, stay close to me. I want to keep you out of harm's way.
OK.
Hmm.
Of course.
